description: Bill is a triangle-shaped character, an evil dream demon master of illusions.

questions.answer: Bill Cipher has his own alphabet of 26 symbols, each corresponding to a letter of the Latin alphabet. To encrypt a message with Bill Cipher is therefore to replace each letter with the corresponding symbol. Example: BILL is written
questions.question: How to encrypt using Bill Cipher cipher?

questions.answer: Bill Cipher uses an alphabet of 26 symbols corresponding to the classic letters of the Latin alphabet. Decryption is to replace these symbols to get the original plain message. Example:  is translated GRAVITY
questions.question: How to decrypt Bill Cipher cipher?

questions.answer: The symbols used by Bill Cipher are similar to the hyeroglyphs. In Gravity Falls, Bill has a triangle shape, he has only one eye, wears a hat and a bow tie, he is sometimes likened to the eye of providence, its presence could be a clue.
questions.question: How to recognize a Bill Cipher ciphertext?

title: Gravity Falls Bill Cipher
